CREATE LOGIN eei_admin WITH PASSWORD = 'Str0ngP@ssw0rd!';
GO

-- Step 2: Switch context to your dedicated SQL pool database
-- (IMPORTANT: You must change database in SSMS or Synapse Studio manually,
-- the "USE <db>" command is supported only if the pool is online.)
-- Pick database: eei_sqlpool

-- Step 3: Create a user mapped to the login
CREATE USER eei_admin FOR LOGIN eei_admin;
GO

-- Step 4: Grant db_owner role
EXEC sp_addrolemember 'db_owner', 'eei_admin';
GO
